TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AttributeCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type AttributeCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示屬性 (Attribute) 的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是唯讀的; 它不會實作方法，以加入或移除屬性。The class is read-only; it does not implement methods to add or remove attributes. 您必須繼承自這個類別來實作這些方法。You must inherit from this class to implement these methods. 使用屬性來尋找集合中存在的屬性數目。Use the property to find the number of attributes that exist in the collection. 您也可以使用這個類別的方法來查詢有關集合的內容。You can also use the methods of this class to query the collection about its contents. 呼叫方法來驗證指定之屬性或屬性陣列是否存在集合中。Call the method to verify that a specified attribute or attribute array exists in the collection. 呼叫方法以驗證指定之屬性或陣列的屬性存在於集合中，並指定屬性的值會在集合中的值相同。Call the method to verify that a specified attribute or array of attributes exists in the collection, and that the values of the specified attributes are the same as the values in the collection. 雖然大部分屬性都有預設值，預設值不是必要的。While most attributes have default values, default values are not required. 如果屬性沒有預設值，`null`採用型別之索引屬性會傳回。If an attribute has no default value, `null` is returned from the indexed property that takes a type. 在定義您自己的屬性時，您可以提供任何引數的建構函式，或定義您名為 「 預設 」 的屬性類型的公用靜態欄位宣告的預設值。When defining your own attributes, you can declare a default value by either providing a constructor that takes no arguments, or defining a public static field of your attribute type named "Default". ## Examples 若要查看的第一個程式碼範例會檢查是否已設定此集合中。The first code example checks to see whether the has been set in this collection. 第二個的程式碼範例會取得實際值 按鈕。The second code example gets the actual value of the for a button. 這兩個範例需要`button1`和`textBox1`已建立的表單上。Both examples require that `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form. 使用屬性時，請確認屬性已設定，或存取它的值。When using attributes, verify that an attribute has been set, or access its value. [!code-cpp[Classic AttributeCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic AttributeCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[Classic AttributeCollection Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic AttributeCollection Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: if the collection contains the attribute or is the default attribute for the type of attribute; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的屬性類型存在於集合中，並指定屬性的值是否在集合中屬性的執行個體的值相同，這個集合會有指定的屬性。This collection has the specified attribute if the specified type of attribute exists in the collection, and if the value of the specified attribute is the same as the value of the instance of the attribute in the collection. 之間的差異並方法在於呼叫屬性 (attribute) 上的方法和呼叫方法。The difference between the and methods is that calls the method on an attribute, and calls the method. 對於大部分的屬性，這些方法會執行相同的動作。For most attributes, these methods do the same thing. 可能有多個旗標，不過，屬性通常會實作，使它傳回`true`如果滿足任何旗標。For attributes that may have multiple flags, however, is typically implemented so that it returns `true` if any of the flags are satisfied. 例如，請考慮使用布林值旗標 」 SupportsSql"、"SupportsOleDb 」 和 「 SupportsXml"的資料繫結屬性。For example, consider a data binding attribute with the Boolean flags "SupportsSql", "SupportsOleDb", and "SupportsXml". 此屬性可能存在於上支援所有三個資料繫結方法的屬性。This attribute may be present on a property that supports all three data-binding approaches. 它通常會的情況下，程式設計人員只需要知道的特定方法是否可用，並非所有的三個。It will often be the case that a programmer needs to know only if a particular approach is available, not all three. 因此，程式設計人員可以使用與執行個體屬性包含的旗標，程式設計人員的需要。Therefore, a programmer could use with an instance of the attribute containing only the flags the programmer needs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查集合是否具有設定為`true`。The following code example checks to see whether the collection has a set to `true`. 它假設`button1`和`textBox1`已建立的表單上。It assumes that `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic AttributeCollection.Contains Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Contains Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Contains Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Contains Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Contains Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Contains Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: if the collection contains all the attributes; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個集合具有指定的屬性陣列，如果存在於集合中所有指定的屬性類型，並指定陣列中的每個屬性是在集合中的屬性相同。This collection has the specified array of attributes if all the specified attribute types exist in the collection and if each attribute in the specified array is the same as an attribute in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會比較中的屬性`button1`和`textBox1`按鈕的屬性是否會包含在文字方塊中的屬性。The following code example compares the attributes in `button1` and `textBox1` to see whether the attributes for the button are contained in the attributes for the text box. 它假設這兩個`button1`和`textBox1`已建立的表單上。It assumes that both `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic AttributeCollection.Contains1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Contains1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Contains1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Contains1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Contains1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Contains1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

The number of attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來設定限制的迴圈，逐一查看物件的集合。You can use the property to set the limits of a loop that iterates through a collection of objects. 如果集合是以零為起始的請務必使用`Count - 1`做為迴圈的上限。If the collection is zero-based, be sure to use `Count - 1` as the upper boundary of the loop. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用屬性上列印的屬性數目`button1`在文字方塊中。The following code example uses the property to print the number of properties on `button1` in a text box. 它假設`button1`和`textBox1`已建立的表單上。It assumes that `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic AttributeCollection.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Count Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Count Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Count Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以零為起始的索引編號。The index number is zero-based. 因此，您必須從減 1 的數值位置的特定存取， 。Therefore, you must subtract 1 from the numerical position of a particular to access that . 例如，若要取得第三個，您必須指定`myColl[2]`。For example, to get the third , you need to specify `myColl[2]`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用若要列印的名稱屬性索引編號，在文字方塊中所指定。The following code example uses the property to print the name of the specified by the index number in a text box. 因為是以零起始的索引編號，此程式碼範例會列印第二個名稱在文字方塊中。Because the index number is zero-based, this code example prints the name of the second in a text box. 它會假設`button1`和`textBox1`已建立的表單上。It assumes `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic AttributeCollection.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.this Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.this Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.this Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性不存在於集合中，這個屬性會傳回屬性類型的預設值。If the attribute does not exist in the collection, this property returns the default value for the attribute type. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得從集合，並列印其值。The following code example gets the from the collection and prints its value. 它假設`button1`和`textBox1`已建立的表單上。It assumes that `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱的資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可提供比對的支援。An attribute can provide support for matching. 之間的差異並方法在於呼叫屬性 (attribute) 上的方法和呼叫方法。The difference between the and methods is that calls the method on an attribute, and calls the method. 對於大部分的屬性，這些方法會執行相同的動作。For most attributes, these methods do the same thing. 可能有多個旗標，不過，屬性通常會實作，使它傳回`true`如果滿足任何旗標。For attributes that may have multiple flags, however, is typically implemented so that it returns `true` if any of the flags are satisfied. 例如，請考慮使用布林值旗標 」 SupportsSql"、"SupportsOleDb 」 和 「 SupportsXml"的資料繫結屬性。For example, consider a data binding attribute with the Boolean flags "SupportsSql", "SupportsOleDb", and "SupportsXml". 此屬性可能存在於上支援所有三個資料繫結方法的屬性。This attribute may be present on a property that supports all three data binding approaches. 它通常會的情況下，程式設計人員只需要知道的特定方法是否可用，並非所有的三個。It will often be the case that a programmer needs to know only if a particular approach is available, not all three. 因此，程式設計人員可以使用與執行個體屬性包含的旗標，程式設計人員的需要。Therefore, a programmer could use with an instance of the attribute containing only the flags the programmer needs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會確認是集合的成員，而且設定為`true`。The following code example verifies that the is a member of the collection and that it has been set to `true`. 它假設`button1`和`textBox1`已建立的表單上。It assumes that `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic AttributeCollection.Matches Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Matches Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Matches Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Matches Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Matches Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Matches Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可提供比對的支援。An attribute can provide support for matching. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會比較中按鈕和文字方塊，以查看它們是否相符的屬性。The following code example compares the attributes in a button and a text box to see whether they match. 它假設`button1`和`textBox1`已建立的表單上。It assumes that `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form.
